summary: Completed comprehensive testing of custom date range attendance register printout functionality. All requirements successfully implemented and working.
passed_tests: Backend GET /api/attendance/date-range-report returns grouped data with 3 departments (Engineering, Finance, Human Resources)
Each department group has employees array with dailyData and summary (presentDays, absentDays, totalWorkingHours)
Dates array has correct day, month, year, dayName for each date in range (25 dates for 2026-01-15 to 2026-02-08)
Print Register button visible in Reports page header (always visible)
MonthlyPrintView opens with date range picker (From/To inputs), Department Wise/Branch Wise dropdown, Generate button
Default date range loads data and shows table with horizontal layout (days as columns, employees as rows)
Department grouping shows separate tables for Engineering, Finance, Human Resources
Table headers show date numbers (1,2,3...), day names (Mon/Tue/Wed), and In/Out sub-headers
Employee rows show In/Out times in HH:MM format (e.g., 10:16, 18:17)
Summary columns P (present), A (absent), Hrs (total hours) visible on right side
Date range change (2026-01-15 to 2026-02-08) and Generate button work
Branch Wise grouping switch and Generate work (shows 'Unassigned' branch group)
Print/Save PDF button present in toolbar
Landscape A4 format with proper pagination
